title: Chinese orange beef stir-fry
description: This easy beef stir-fry recipe combines Chinese flavours, sirloin steak and zesty orange for a quick, tasty midweek meal.
ingredients: Bunch of spring onions, finely sliced

method.Step 1: Trim the steak and cut into strips. Working in batches, toss the beef in a little cornflour, shaking off any excess. Heat a little vegetable oil in a non-stick pan and stir-fry for 2 minutes, until golden. Set aside on a plate.

method.Step 2: Add the garlic, orange juice and soy sauce to the pan, and bring to the boil.

method.Step 3: Return the beef to the pan plus any meat juices, add the spring onions and heat through. Serve with egg noodles.
